results.definition: the act of beginning something new
examples: they looked forward to the debut of their new product line

results.definition: appear for the first time in public
examples: The new ballet that debuts next months at Covent Garden, is already sold out
This young soprano debuts next month at the Metropolitan Opera

results.definition: present for the first time to the public
examples: The band debuts a new song or two each month

results.definition: the presentation of a debutante in society
